channel.title: Posts on The Dunbars123 website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Dunbars123 website

item.title: An Update for second week
item.description:
Introduction

Hello, It’s been a while.

I have not long started a new job with the local council and it has been an experience.

Today, has been a great day for me. Especially after a few days off leave, even though I was ill.

Got some great work done.

About Monday (19/8/24)

This is my second week in, and its quite exciting, new fire panel, new files to scan plus, a secret rave haha

item.title: The Experience
item.description:
Introduction

The experience for working with Hugo has been excelent, I can’t fault it what so ever, and the way it is, can be so excelent.

As an example, this is the first time I’m using something like this and can’t fault it what so ever.

Final words

The experience of setting up ssh, using casaos (running off Ubuntu Server which is linked) as a base OS, then having to install Hugo. I found it nice and easy.

item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Introduction

Welcome to my first Blog Post

I am using Hugo to do this and it is a wonderful website build tool.

I think you should figure it out.

Visit the Hugo website!
